comment.brief: The element gets a position to match it's world location to that of the master element; the element will have the same visual location and size and the master element.
comment.full: The element gets a position to match it's world location to that of the master element; the element will have the same visual location and size and the master element.

comment.brief: The element copies the master elements local size and position (relative to its own parent).
comment.full: The element copies the master elements local size and position (relative to its own parent).

comment.brief: The element copies the local size and position of the master element's parent.
comment.full: The element copies the local size and position of the master element's parent.

comment.brief: The element copies the master elements local size and position (relative to its own parent).
comment.full: The element copies the master elements local size and position (relative to its own parent).
